attribute-definition.description: Amount paid (divide by 100)
Order Amount(divide by 100)
Get your Product activation key from the Novalnet Admin Portal: PROJECT > Choose your project > Shop Parameters > API Signature (Product activation key)
Get your Payment access key from the Novalnet Admin Portal: PROJECT > Choose your project > Shop Parameters > Payment access key
Get your client key from the Novalnet Admin Portal: PROJECT > Choose your project > Shop Parameters > Client Key
Enter a Tariff ID to match the preferred tariff plan you created at the Novalnet Admin Portal for this project
Enables or disables the cartridge

attribute-definition.display-name: Allow manual testing of the Notification / Webhook URL
attribute-definition.description: Enable this to test the Novalnet Notification / Webhook URL manually. Disable this before setting your shop live to block unauthorized calls from external parties
Notification / Webhook URL execution messages will be sent to this e-mail
You must configure the webhook endpoint in your Novalnet Admin portal. This will allow you to receive notifications about the transaction
The payment will be processed in the test mode therefore amount for this transaction will not be charged

Choose whether or not the payment should be charged immediately. Capture completes the transaction by transferring the funds from buyer account to merchant account. Authorize verifies payment details and reserves funds to capture it later , giving time for the merchant to decide on the order

In case the order amount exceeds the mentioned limit, the transaction will be set on-hold till your confirmation of the transaction. You can leave the field empty if you wish to process all the transactions as on-hold
Payment details that are saved during the ordering process can be used for future payments
Number of days after which the payment is debited ( must be between 2 and 14 days )
The entered text will be displayed at the checkout page
The payment will be processed in the test mode therefore amount for this transaction will not be charged

Payment details that are saved during the ordering process can be used for future payments
By enabling this option, all payments from cards issued outside the EU will be authenticated via 3DS 2.0 SCA.
Inline form : The following fields will be shown in the checkout in two lines : card holder & credit card number / expiry date / CVC

attribute-group.description: Europe-wide Direct Debit system that allows you to collect Euro currencies from buyers in the 34 SEPA countries and associated regions
Funds are withdrawn from the buyer's account using credit/debit card details
A payable credit note with the order details
Payment is debited after order confirmation and, the goods are then delivered

attribute-group.group-id: Novalnet Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee
attribute-group.display-name: Novalnet Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee Configuration
attribute-group.description: Guaranteed payment made to you either from the buyer or from payment guarantee for the purchase made through SEPA

attribute-group.display-name: Novalnet Invoice with payment guarantee Configuration
attribute-group.description: Guaranteed payment made to you either from the buyer or from payment guarantee for the purchase made through invoice
Dutch payment method that allow your buyers to make instant payments online through his own bank
Pan European payment method allows buyers to pay through their own internet banking system
German based online payment method where funds are instantly transferred from buyer's account to your account
Transaction is completed through cash payments using cash slips in countries like Germany and Austria
Poland based payment method which allows buyers pay using bank transfers or any other methods
Austria based online banking method that allows your buyers to pay using any form of electronic payments
Buyer pays his bill as instalment payments through a single or recurring invoice(s)

attribute-group.group-id: Novalnet Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA
attribute-group.display-name: Novalnet Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA Configuration
attribute-group.description: Through this payment method you can collect amount periodically like subscription or instalment payments through SEPA
Electronic wallet that alows buyers to pay using any payment modes they have added to their PayPal account
Swiss based online card payment method which allows buyers to pay using PostFinance Card
Swiss based online account system where buyers are redirected to login and pay using their PostFinance Card
Belgium based online payment method where buyers are redirected to Bancontact site/app for payment authorization
Voucher based payment method where buyer pays in ATM or at retail outlets using a reference ID
